::Astral/Recklessa/Fenox/Starlight::

Astral growls, running off and following Prebon, firing at the bot.

"Tell that to the Pit when we send you there!" He yells.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recklessa swirls out of the way of the shots, even though they 
probably wouldn't have hit anyways. She speeds up, firing two more 
missiles at Prebon.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fenox speeds up, above the ocean and heading for the Iron Fist. She 
knew they wouldn't lower the shields untill Prebon was taken care of, 
but the missile launchers and laser turrets would take care of that 
nicely.

"Calm down, hun!" She told D as he began to claw at her, "If y' don't 
stop struggling I'll drop ya!"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Starlight continues after Prebon, firing four more charges at him.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Prebon swerves to the side avoiding the blast from the charges. his 
sensors
> detect missles coming up the rear. he flies to the left as a missle 
and a
> charge collide. the shrapnel tears at his armor but he knows that 
he must
> keep pace with Fenox when the new bot got through the shields he 
would go
> too. a second missle gained speed and was getting close to him. He 
sensed
> Astral firing again. he wasn't worried about him, the trainer 
leaders armor
> seemed to be holding well against the shots from Astrals rifle. 
Prebon fired
> his rifle again destroying the second missle. His backpack was 
starting to
> smoke from the way he was pushing for speed. He didn't worry though 
it
> should get him as far as the alliance base, getting back is 
something he'd
> worry about later.
> 
> "I will not fail, you will all fall before the might of the 
Trainers." he
> yells into his comm. he fires two more shots at Starlight and two 
in the
> direction of Recklessa. he didn't have time to aim so the shots 
would have
> to be intended as a distraction.

> >
> > "Right," he replies to Prebon as he jumps up, picking up his 
dropped
> > rifle and firing again, "And I'm Unicron."
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Starlight rolls in the air to try to avoid the shot, but it hits 
her
> > leg, severing it. She swears and cuts the mechfluid flow to her 
leg,
> > firing three more charges down at Prebon.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Recklessa growls when she realizes who the rest of the team were
> > fighting. It was that bot that had blasted her into the water!
> >
> > She jumped into the air, her jetpack activating and sending her
> > toward Prebon.
> >
> > "Die!!!!" she yells, firing two large missiles at Prebon.
> >

> >

Alliance
> > was
> > > at the CF so there was a good chance of victory. "My troops fell
> > > because they didn't listen to logic." The three he was fighting
> > were
> > > a fair team. Shots ricochet off his armor as he gained speed in 
his
> > > attempt to keep up with Fenox. out of the corner of his optics 
he
> > saw
> > > charges coming his way. the first of which caught him off gaurd
> > > exploding and forceing him to change direction.he grabbed the
> > second
> > > one and redirected it down at Astral. the third one scored a 
solid
> > > hit causing a rupture in the back of his armor. he aimed his
> > > constrictor rifle up at Starlight and fired a beam that would 
knock
> > > the target out of the fight.
> > >
> > > "You fools are nothing more than a design flaw, I am the 
advanced
> > > model on this world." He yells as the chase continued.
